body:
Declare @Eski Varchar(200) = 'PSP06_Import_Iplik_LeoyAl',
		@Yeni Varchar(200) = 'SP200_Import_Iplik_LeoyAl'

Exec sys.sp_rename @objname = @Eski, @newname = @Yeni

Update IT15_ObjectsM Set ITObjectName = @Yeni Where ITObjectName = @Eski
Update IT15_ObjectsD Set ITSPSecimAfter = @Yeni Where ITSPSecimAfter = @Eski
Update IT15_ObjectsD Set ITSPSecim = @Yeni Where ITSPSecim = @Eski
